project.name: OtterCA Registration Authority
project.description:
The Registration Authority (RA) is responsible for collecting accreditation information from potental subjects and Relying Entities, obtaining supporting documentation (e.g., from an LDAP server or public records), making a go/no go decision on issuing a certificate, and if approved passing it on to the Certificate Authority for signature.
The Registration Authority is also responsible for notifying the subject or Relying Entity of the decision, providing the certificate, and accepting and disseminating revocation requests.
